about.title: About me
about.p1: From the first line of code, I was fascinated by the power to build logical structures and create interactive experiences. My passion lies in solving puzzles and bringing creative ideas to life. This drives my constant desire to learn, and I am excited to start the backend course immediately following my frontend bootcamp to become a full-stack developer.
about.info1: Based in Olpe, I am perfectly set up for remote work and open to various working models to contribute my skills to exciting projects.
about.info2: I am deeply enthusiastic about diving into new technologies. My journey through the Developer Akademie has solidified my belief in lifelong learning, and I am always eager to embrace the next challenge and expand my tech stack.
about.info3: I approach challenges with a structured and analytical mindset. For me, every problem is an opportunity to find the most efficient and elegant solution, combining creative thinking with persistent, methodical work to achieve clean and effective results.

skills.title: My skills
skills.p1: I have experience in implementing projects with various front-end technologies and agile methodologies.
skills.p3: I am enthusiastic about learning new technologies and frameworks to stay on the cutting edge.
